## ScriptHost.replaceFuncs() method

Replaces the specified exposed functions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
replaceFuncs(funcs: ExposedFunctions): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  funcs | [ExposedFunctions](./scripthost.exposedfunctions.md) | The newly exposed functions |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

Only functions that were exposed when the script host was initialized can be replaced. An attempt to expose another function will cause an error to be thrown.
